long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The tabs manager extension offers a convenient way to organize and optimize tab usage in the Chrome browser. Users can delete individual tabs directly from the menu, simplifying tab management. Additionally, the extension includes a time-saving feature that allows users to delete all tabs at once by pressing a single button. This functionality streamlines browsing and improves productivity by reducing clutter and providing efficient control over open tabs.
